title: Did the 2021-25 batch have 3rd Yr 5th sem isa's all mcq's? If yes why so cuz we 22 batch had descriptive. And are we going to have all mcq's too this year?

comments.body:
>Did the 2021-25 batch have 3rd Yr 5th sem isa's all mcq's?  
No, we did not. We had mix of subjective and MCQ questions.

  
Your 2nd question, depends on PES management, we never know. PESU is always experimental with every batch.
